alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moomaws Corner, or 16 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moomaws Corner and Kilpatrick Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
